data.title: Frisk (Undertale) Discussion: The Pacifist or The Genocidal
data.meta_description: The game Undertale has grown quite spontaneously (at least in my view piont) poppingup everywhere on youtube but it is quite famous for a lot of it's features b
data.text:
The game Undertale has grown quite spontaneously (at least in my view piont) poppingup everywhere on youtube but it is quite famous for a lot of it's features but espeacially one, it is the first RPG game where there are three branching paths, one where you kill every last character (Genocide Run), one where you slip up (The Neutral Run), and the only way to get the true ending, not hurting anyone (Pacifist Run), yes you heard me. The only way to get the true final boss is to not kill any character.Another thing is this games story is complicated. I know I should stop posting character suggestions for games I haven't played but trust me, I actually researched this on, a lot. (Also if you haven't played the game, don't ruin it for your self like I did pick it up on steam for like $10, anyway, I am going to be telling the story, the entire story and all of the lore that I have picked up. So without further ado)

Mass Spoiler Alert:

Before the events of Undertale, on our planet, two races lived in peace, The monsters of all shapes and sizes and traits, and the Humans. Peace was had for awhile do to one law that governed both races. I a human gave their soul up to a monster or a monster killed a human the monster would absorb the human soul and become all powerful. Another thing was that when a human dies it can live on in this world as a soul that can posess objects as seen by the dummy in the sewer area of the game. Monsters however cannot their souls last for a few seconds before breaking. Their are exceptions such as Muffet, Megaton, Sans, Papyrus, Toriel, Asgore, Undyne, and Alphys These are the eight boss monsters seen in the game. Each you fight on different paths. These monsters can sustain their lifes due to them containing one of each part of the Human soul. The parts of a human soul are as follows Bravery, Integrity, Determination, Justice, Kindness, and Patience. As a war raged from the humans versus the Monsters 6 mages came upon the Monsters and sealed them underground. It is said that only the power of 7 Human souls can free the monsters.

This is Chara, a human in the beggining of the game you name her and through the entire game, you are called by her name. On ething is for certain she is an entirely evil being. Before the evnets of Undertale but after the war, Chara climbed a tall mountain and found a deep fit by accident she fell down into the pit and ended up in the land of Undertale. right where she fell down the King and Queen of the Monsters lived Toriel and Asgore Dreemurr and their son Asriel notice howhe isn't a boss monster he cannot sustain his soul after death. Now the King and Queen adopted Chara showing her nothing but kindnessand she showed that back to them. To her adopted brother she was rude, mean, and forceful. She made him gather the wrong ingredients for a pie for Asgore when he ate it he became nothing more then ill. Yet Chara now had a plan, she would make Asriel gather the ingredeints again, but this time for her. She comitted suicide and died in Asriel's arms, now Chara made her soul be absorbed by Asriel and could now communicate with him. He asked where to put the body and she told him about a human village. When hetook her body their, the locals thought that he had killed hed and immediately attacked him as this was happening Chara tried to take over the body but failed as Asreil had done no wrong, as he was stabbed again and again he looked up at the locals and smiled. He walked back to the Underground went to his father's arms and looked at his parent's faces smiling as he turned to dust. The king and queen now losing both of thier children were distraught but the king too this another way telling his people that they would get out of the underground and be free by harvesting 7 souls of humans. To the king this was propoganda but the queen would not hear it. She left taking nothing but the flower that Asreil picked to bury Chara with and left to their original home. She planted those flowers at the bottom of the pit, the first place the players see when they awake underground she also took Chara and buried her under the flower. Now with all the lore out of the way let's start our tale.

This is Frisk, they are the main character of Undertale and is the Hero/Villian of the world. They have three paths to choose with each path affecting each character one path saving every character, and another killing all, and lastly a path that saves only you. Through this all Frisk meets many characters including all six boss characters (Asgore, Toriel, Alphys, Sans, Papyrus, and Undyne) Metatton, Muffet, and Flowey. Befriending or killing them off, but only two characters partially remember the shifting timelines, Flowey through the entire game and Sans as shown during his fight at the end of the Genocide run. There are actually four final bosses though, Omega Flowey, Asgore Dreemurr, Asriel Dreemurr, and Sans. They are either killed or befriended by Frisk and either way are affected by Frisk.

Regular: Punch, Punch, Kick

Side: Slap

Up: Uppercut

Down: Downwards Kick

Side Smash: Bonetruosle (Like Ness' Bat a quick charge then a major hit, if it's blue when the opponent stands still the attack won't hit)

Up Smash: Ghost Fight (Tears Upwards if held down for the duration that the top hat is created hat will be kept and opponents won't be able to hit from above.)

Down Smash: Battle Against a True Hero (Quick spears rain down in front of Chara/Frisk)

Neutral Air: Death by Glamor (Raining Mettaton fall to the ground)

Mettaton:

Side Air: No Mercy (A mercy bar shows up and is quickly destroyed by a red spear.)

Mercy Bar:

Red Spear:

Back Air: No Mercy

Up Air: Bergentruckung (don't try yo pronounce it) (A flurry of spear attacks upwards)

Down Air: Heartbreak (A hail of fire rains down)

Neutral Special: Dumy! (Scribbles are fired from your being)

Magic Attack:

The scribbles are the magic attack...

Down Special: Spears of Justice (A giant spear hurtles to the ground)

Up Special: Spider Dance (A giant Spider carries you up hurting foes)

Side Special: Dogsong (An annoying dog leaps at the opponent)

Final Smash:

Hopes and Dreams:

Hopes and Dreams is a Final Boss Song:

(Toriel, Asgore, Alphys, Undyne, Papyrus, and Sans come together and protect you from Asriel as the stage is inclosed in a big box in which a bullet hell minigame ensues in which the fighters have to avoid all attacks from Asriel Dreemurr the angel of Hyperdeath. Blue shots if you stay still will not hurt you.)

Megalovania:

Megaloania is a Final Boss song:

Sans standing his ground attacks the entire arena trying to attack you but can't hit you no matter what. No Invincibility frames just basically lingering damage (Poison)

Your Best Nightmare:

Your Best Nightmare is a Final Boss song:

Omega Flowey appears on stage and uses a random human soul to attack the area, attacks that hit Frisk/Chara gets healed.

Yes, almost every attack was named after a song in this beautiful, beautiful game.

Last edited by DestinyIntwined on Tue Jan 05, 2016 3:57 pm; edited 5 times in total
